name: Rockbox Plug-in
summary: Learn about .ROCK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Rockbox firmware is installed using the Rockbox Utility, a desktop application for Mac, Windows, and Linux platforms.

description: Plug-in file used by Rockbox, an open source firmware for portable music players; stores a game or another small application that can run on Rockbox; enables Rockbox "apps" to be used on iPods, SanDisk MP3 players, and other portable music players.
